manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bamboo Baby Wipes, 80ct Bamboo Baby Sensitive Wipes, 72ct Texture Unbleached bamboo fibre with cross-weave technology that's ultra soft and extra strong. Unbleached bamboo fibre with cross-weave technology that's ultra soft and extra strong. Scent Mild scent from Chamomile and Lavender oils give off a pleasant scent. No artificial fragrance - any scent resulting from this product is attributed to its natural oils and ingredients. Benefits Specially formulated to soothe and cleanse on gentle, delicate skin, leaving it feeling silky-smooth. Perfume free to soothe and cleanse on delicate, sensitive skin, leaving it feeling silky-smooth. Proudly Canadian ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for adults with sensitive bums
reviews.reviewText: I have hemorrhoids and have to use wipes to minimize irritation. Here are all the reasons I love these:- Biodegradable / compostable / environmentally friendly (bamboo is abundant)- Sturdy - never falls apart during use- Ideal moisture level, down to the last wipe in the bag- Pleasant, *subtle* scent! I don't know what the other reviews are on about- Perfectly reasonable packaging - no frustration here- A great value - I use these multiple times per day and this 5-pack lasted me 10 months!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: my whole family uses these and they are great! There's no weird scent, and they are the perfect amount of softness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft, functional wipe that comes out of the box easily!
reviews.reviewText: I have been shopping around for an eco-friendly wipe that smells good, is soft, and doesn't cause irritation for months. These are winners. As a bonus, they easily come out of the box! This put them above Naty brand for me, my other favorite, because Naty all only dispense in a giant mass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s just okay... Perhaps can find better?
reviews.reviewText: For the environment, I refuse to use anything but biodegradable. I switched from water wipes the moment I found out that they weren’t biodegradable. Tried Aleva for the first time and I’m not really impressed nor am I unsatisfied. I just wanna try another brand.The packaging is probably the most annoying part. Every time I open up a new one, I have to tear a bigger hole because idk what tiny fingers can reach inside the package to grab the wipe. Ofc they don’t use glue to hold the wipes together so when you pull it doesn’t always follow. So you’re gunna be putting your finger in that hole multiple times in one change. You’re gunna need to break the hole open so you don’t struggle so much when ya need it.You also would need on average 4 baby wipes per doo doo changing. Much much more for the messy ones.I’m okay with the lemon scent. I love lemon but it’s a very odd smell for baby wipes lol. I associate lemon with cleaning products, not my baby’s tush.No rash, no pink/red bottom. So it’s gentle enough for my boy.Currently searching for another biodegradable baby wipe brand to try out. 😩 I probably wouldn’t recommend to friends. Instead I’m asking them lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I swear reading reviews is like a comedy show - someone’s coochie was burning - ok all I can say is I do use them for that very fact and I have no problems. I guess if you have an allergy to almonds just maybe that would cause it - don’t forget everyone is unique. To me there is no smell and I can smell literally anything at a much greater height than a normal person - yes we do exist, research us. Is the hole small enough to reach it every time or that you have to get it one by one - doesn’t bother me. What bothers me is that the company has a mega pack at 900 something and Amazon just refuses to sell it here. Can we get you to sell the mega pack please for these wipes and the feminine ones because it isn’t fair that the company can’t ship to the US and you do have a choice to sell the mega packs but yet you refuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love love!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love these. They are super soft and feel great. Not hard to take out of the packaging. And the packs are really big. 80 wipes per package. The wipes themselves are big, but I don't use them for a baby, I use them on myself. So I just tear one in half and put the other half back in the package, make it last twice as long haha. 6 come in each box. It will take me a while to get through them so I'll be gifting them for sure. LOVE that they're biodegradable AND body friendly. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these wipes on my 5 month old. Light scent, great for sensitive skin. And doesn't have all those harsh chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Packaging should be improved
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these wipes for about 6 months now. I use them in a wipe warmer so I add distilled water to them and they stay nice and moisturized in the warmer. They don't cause any skin irritation to my sensitive skin babe. They're a good size, thick, feed decently (could definitely be improved though), smell clean, decent amount of moisture when not using in wipe warmer, convenient resealable package for diaper bag. The package is TOO hard to break open though! I've sliced my thumb on the plastic ring on top trying to break into these wipes. Super annoying. You can't just rip them open like you would a bag of chips, you have to peel off the plastic ring, take the sticker part off, and then rip the bag open from that hole. It's ridiculously inconvenient. But, the ingredients are worth the pain of opening a pack every couple of days.

I’ve been using these bamboo wipes for years for my own personal use, not for a baby. I like the way they easily clean up dirty hands and messes so easily without leaving a residue on my skin. They’re unscented as well which is perfect for adults and babies especially. They also come in a formula for sensitive skin. I’ve recently started buying these wipes from Amazon as the price is amazing and I get more for my money. The wipes are also biodegradable which is great.
Great natural wipes. I've reordered them multiple times. They're good quality and I always keep these on hand because they're also good to have for cleaning up small messes or wiping hands.
We have bought these for the past 5 years and they are by far the best wipe on the market for sensitive skin. They have a mild pleasant smell and are almost always at a great price.

I'm using these for makeup removal on the occasion that I wear makeup. It's not often anymore & I find it irritating when I do.These wipes are large & very soft. They have a light, un-offensive scent that doesn't linger on your skin. They leave my face very soft & do an adequate job removing make up. A good wash is always needed regardless of the wipe but these help with stubborn eye makeup & no chemical burn or irritation.My only concern is the light amount of moisture & what little moisture there is dissipates very quickly. I usually need 2 of them to complete the job making them rather expensive compared to other options.
These are so gentle. Only brand I trust
